title: New: Naomi Scott – Lover's Lies
body:
Anthemic pop vibes from London’s **Naomi Scott** on her new track, _Lover’s Lies_, lifted from a forthcoming EP titled **_Promises_**.

Also known for her acting in recent blockbuster The Martian, alongside appearances in Terra Nova (which, FYI, ended too soon) and The 33, Scott’s vocal delivery is considered and deeply affecting. Check out Lover’s Lies below.

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
